name: Replica Mural: Ancient Ritual in a Sea of Fog
description: A replica made of a certain mural that depicts an enigmatic ritual. This must've been the ritual that the people of Tsurumi Island performed before the descent of the Thunderbird...\nIt is said the ancient natives of Tsurumi Island would use paints to depict ancient, now-unremembered history onto the rock walls of caves, and that these murals have remained pristine to this day. One might be able to learn more about an unknown past through this mural...
